Message.Msg: He bought almost 320,000 AMZN shares as did two other Billionaires. Look at the 5 day on AMZN, several Mutual funds and Hedge Funds are adding big time daily. I have watched several 100,000 share block buys. 52 week high will be taken out like butter next week and record earnings ahead with 18-25% online sales spike to go with the chitload of kindle fires they are selling along with presents and more content then they ever have before. AMZN has a habit of going straight up from thaksgiving till New Years and this is the best year they have ever had holiday wise with online traffic spikes confirmed by compuserv Goog is too high and will sell off if fiscal cliff selling starts, as AMZN will be one of the bright spots with no sellers and shorts afraid to short it and they should be.
Cyber Monday deals are at least as good as Black Friday deals but in many cases they are better
